name: prune-lockfile

schema.title: Prune Lockfile
schema.description: Creates a pruned lockfile based on the project dependencies and places it into the output directory.

buildTarget.description: The build target that produces the output directory to place the pruned lockfile.

outputPath.description: The output path to place the pruned lockfile. Usually inferred from the outputs of the buildTarget.

description: Creates a pruned lockfile based on the project dependencies and places it into the output directory.
